welcome_message_body: Welcome to Plainview, a charming city in the heart of the United States known for its friendly community and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Plainview has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at JFK, serving international airlines such as Air France and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A small terminal mostly used by Delta Air Lines for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at JFK, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A modern terminal used exclusively by JetBlue Airways for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A major terminal used by various international airlines, including British Airways and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: The newest terminal at JFK, primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to United Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Air Lines and WestJet.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
